```{r}
library(faraway)
gala
X = cbind(c("Intercept = 1"), gala$Area, gala$Elevation, gala$Nearest, gala$Scruz, gala$Adjacent)
y = as.matrix(gala$Species)

t(X)
dim(t(X))

t(X) %*% X


X %*% y
solve( t(X) %*% X ) %*% t(X) %*% y
```
